column2: An ice specter from edge of the cosmos,
column3: residing on an eternally frozen planet.

column2: Commanding frost that freezes all matter around
column3: it, this spirit shatters Barriers with vicious icicles.
column4: Colossus Slayer, tough vs & 100% Slows Aliens & Zombies.
